IRIS-HEP Topical Meetings


IRIS-HEP topical meetings cover one or more presentations involving IRIS-HEP researchers or from related research areas. They are typically held Mondays 17:30 GVA and Wednesdays 18:00 GVA. Vidyo connections are always available and meetings are usually recorded. Find all topical meeting agendas here.


    January, 2020
    • 29 Jan, 2020 - Primary vertex finding at LHCb
    • 13 Jan, 2020 - Modeling computing resource needs/costs

    • 27 Nov, 2019 - Unfolding
